topic.title: Canonical Data Model (CDM) Glossary
topic.shortdesc: The glossary provides the key terminology and definitions used across the Canonical Data Model.

body.p: The Canonical Data Model (CDM) Glossary is a structured reference document that defines the Data Elements included in the physical Canonical Data Models, ensuring consistent meaning and usage of data across the NHS data infrastructure.
To view the Canonical Data Model (CDM) Glossary, see CDM Glossary.
For further information on the Canonical Data Model (CDM), see: Canonical Data Model (CDM).
For any questions about the Canonical Data Model, please email: england.cdm@nhs.net.
